messages.subject: Kubikiri Asaemon Token Oshigata & Satsuma Koshirae for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Guys and Gals, Sorry for the crass commercialism but some had mentioned interest in the two books I just put up on Ebay and I thought I d give everyone a fair
messages.messageBody:
Guys and Gals,

Sorry for the crass commercialism but some had
mentioned interest in the two books I just put up on
Ebay and I thought I'd give everyone a fair chance at
them.

SATSUMA KOSHIRAE:
http://tinyurl.com/mpmb

Kubikiri Asaemon Token Oshigata 2 Vol Set:
http://tinyurl.com/mpmd

Thanks for looking.

Bob R
